name: crafty-controller
description: Crafty Controller is a Minecraft server manager with a web UI to manage multiple game instances. It provides real-time logs, backups, whitelist management, and supports cross-platform deployments.
features: Multi-Server Management: Control multiple Minecraft instances from one interface. Centralized game hosting.
Real-Time Logs: Monitor server activity and player actions live. Stay informed instantly.
Automated Backups: Schedule regular world saves automatically. Never lose progress.
Whitelist Control: Manage player access with easy whitelist tools. Keep servers secure.
Web Interface: Intuitive dashboard for all server operations. No command-line needed.
Cross-Platform: Deploy on Windows, Linux, or macOS. Works everywhere you need.
